desc: Newport Beach Candle Co. is a woman owned small business that hand pours soy wax candles, free of phthalates, dyes and plastics. Business mission surrounded around bringing love and light into your home while keeping the environment in the center of our hearts. Offering a refill discount to encourage sustainability.

layout.text: Hand Poured, 100% Pure Soy Wax Candles. Made In Southern Califorinia.
